>
[Intimidating Glare](/Feats.aspx?ID=796) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 262 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

You can Demoralize with a mere glare. When you do, Demoralize loses the auditory trait and gains the visual trait, and you don’t take a penalty if the creature doesn’t understand your language.

<title level="2">Intimidating Glare leads to...</title>
[Terrifying Howl](/Feats.aspx?ID=161)
name: Intimidating Glare
